评论详情: Like many of you, skeptical as style different but that’s what made this so appealing. Also dress up or down easy. I wore with suede brown over knee boots for fundraising event. Added some turquoise long earrings for pop of color. Color rust not orange. I wore with silicone sticky breast inserts (hate half bras!) and the one shoulder is cut in near the neck which is a cool addition. Washed in lingerie bag on delicate and hung up to dry. No issue. One challenge is the wrinkles and I used iron on delicate setting & for the cowl neck I had to take off ironing board and hold in my hand to prevent creasing. Give yourself extra time for that! It does hug you in hips and I cut one of my slips (DIY in last minute necessity lol) to be short enough under dress and that worked perfect - no more ride up or static cling. I received MANY compliments. You’ll be the only one wearing this gem. (for reference: I’m 5’ 4” 137 lb 36D)
Wore this dress for a friend’s wedding last fall. Lots of compliments the material was great and  was very comfortable.
would recommend to anyone. not see through and nice to wash and dry and not the most stretchy but you can tie it on the side to hide whatever
beautiful, love the color and the materials, true size, looks as the photo.
Dress was super cute when it came. Mine was missing a button and the tag but the color and sizing were perfect!

I purchased this to wear to a friends wedding. I did not inspect the item when it came in, and when the day came for the wedding and I was getting dressed, I noticed it had what looked like a burn hole in it. The "burn" was under the wrap portion of the dress so it was able to be hidden, but I did have to return the dress and wasn't able to wear it unfortunately. The color was so beautiful, I'm sure a non defective (or non-burned!) dress would be lovely for most occasions.
Wore this for my bridal shower and received many compliments. Material was comfortable and flattering. Also wore it as a reception dress after my wedding.
Stretchy and flattering, one downfall was the wrinkles.

评论概述: Be careful which color u pick
评论详情: 5’11 and 120lbs. 34 A/B and neutral skin tones I bought this dress in a few colors, and although i did weirdly enjoy the baby pink, I would not recommend it for lighter skin tones. The dress is very frumpy and it’s easy to get lost in the fabric. Not super stretchy tbh the wrap tie could go tighter on my body. Def more of a summer option cuz it wouldn’t be warm at all in the winter. The dress is cut pretty dang short, which is cute, but not exactly the look I’m going for. As a tall girl, everything is short on me. Don’t need this one to do that too. Quality is comparable to like high school homecoming, if that
Flattering. Beautiful color. Good fit
Right as I was getting ready to put the dress on both of the top bottoms fell off. Other than that the dress was nice. The wrap is flattering if you have a tummy. Fabric is kind of thin.

I ordered this to wear to a fine dining experience.  I ended up returning it because it fit me weird.  Its cute on the model, just not on me.  It was comfortable and the fabric felt nice.  I would recommend trying it.  You never know, it could look cute on you!
So cute!
Great quality. Super comfortably. Light weight. The color is like a light seafoam color. I am 5'10 & 140 lbs. I got a medium & it fit great. I would order again for sure. Great value for money.
Material was so thin and cheap
Not as cute in person fabric looks cheap
True to size! Got so many compliments will order in other colors.
This dress is very flattering!! Loved it!!
I have tried washing this, steaming this, hanging it for weeks in the shower and I cannot get the wrinkles from this material to make this dress wearable. I have kept it in hope of discovering a way.
True to size. Color is beautiful too..
Fit the occasion of a rooftop wedding! The neck made this very elegant. I was very pleased. Does rise a lil when sitting but other then that No problems
Love this dress!  It’s super flattering, feels nice on my skin and it washes great!  Did not have to even steam it. I purchased the medium…I’m usually a small, so I sized up. I’m 5’6 and 132 lbs.

The material felt like butter on my skin! Even in the Vegas heat, it was perfect! The length was knee high, I’m 4’11” and it fit beautifully. Not very stretchy, but true to size. Very lightweight, color was gorgeous and not at all see through. Highly recommended ❤️
I wore it for a wedding & got so many compliments! I ordered a small & it fit great

Wore this last night to a party and got tons of compliments! It's extremely flattering and lightweight. I like the quality as well! The off shoulder cut looks stylish, I wore it with an off shoulder bra. The only "issue" is that it came in very, very wrinkly and took me a good 20 minutes to iron it.  Would I order it again? Hell yes!

5’4”, 155 pounds, 36C, dress is size M.  Loved everything about this. Wore it on a cruise and felt amazing!!! Easy to steam, the price is a steal, and the dress is very comfortable. I will be buying this in other colors. I have always been stressed looking for the perfect dress to wear as wedding guest or to semi-formal events and finally I have the perfect one.
Runs small, has a weird smell and cheap fabric.
Planning on wearing this for a wedding.  Fit well when I tried it on.
The dress arrived with stains on it.
Love love love this dress.

评论概述: Finally - a great quality Amazon dress that looks just like the pictures!
评论详情: Bought this dress last minute for a wedding - it is very flattering & looks just like the pics. Color was gorgeous. Dress wasn’t way too short like most are these days. Would buy from this brand again!!
La medida,el diseño y la textura súper..justo lo que esperaba!
This dress was everything I hoped it would be. I wore it to a bachelorette party and I got a bunch of compliments! Might order in other colors.
Fit true to size but smelled horrendous. Clearly someone had worn it and returned and I was the lucky winner that got it. Looked cheaply made with very thin material.

I wish the top part of this dress was symmetrical because if it was it would be perfect. It hid all of my curves. The top laid awkwardly and in the end I just can't get past it. The sleeve holes are very different sizes. Gosh how I would love to find this dress with the top half being symmetrical.

I’m 5-7 148lbs and I ordered a medium which fit perfect. This style is very flattering great fabric does not cling and show panty lines. I purchased mine for 19.99 but the price went up or I would have ordered I ever  colors!! I used a steamer and it held up wrinkle free even after hours of dancing at. Party.

评论概述: Great dress for fun bridal occassions
评论详情: Loved it! Cute and classy for a Bach weekend.

This dress was cute, however it was slightly too big on one side and I had to pin the dress so my chest wasn’t showing from the armhole. Other than that, I got so many compliments and I felt so Bonita 💕

I really wanted to like this dress, but the cut of the neck area was too odd. I thought it would as going to be an interesting detail, but it ended up looking strange on me. Perhaps on a slimmer person? I returned it immediately.
Loved this dress , true to size
I love this dress.  I would order it in every color if I could. So flattering and perfect amount of sexy.

Cute dress, but short for tall women, and I have curves, so it kept rising up, other than that, the color looks like the picture, and form fitting in the back, if I wanted it to fit a little bit more lose, I would order a size up, I ordered a large.
Originally ordered for a grad dress. I am 5’1” and it was too long on me but was very cute. Decent material for the price and great for occasion like a graduation.

I had tried this dress on in the longer version and loved it. Bought the shorter hoping it would work as a 2nd dress for my wedding and didn’t love it. Tried it on in a L and XL and it just wasn’t it. Not great for shorter ladies!  I think it’s perfect price. The material is nice. Looks like it would iron well. It is a comfortable material. The fabric was heavy enough where I wasn’t worried. It was also comfortable! White can be rough but I didn’t think this was see through as much as other dresses I tried.

评论概述: Great Cocktail Party, Wedding or Night out Dress!
评论详情: Love the fit and material of this dress. Wore it out with friends for my birthday dinner in the city and got so many compliments! It has a little stretch to it so it’s great for those of us that have a little more curves and need some give. I am 5’7”, size 10 and  36DD and a large fit me perfectly. The listing image actually makes the dress seem shorter than it is, and I looked at reviews and saw that it was actually a little longer on most people so I gave it a try. So glad I did!. If you have a larger chest, make sure you have a good bra with adjustable straps so you can take one strap and go across. Dress is super comfortable too! Great value. Planning to get it in black too!
I love it. It hides the fupa. I definitely plan to get at least one more in a different color.
I wanted to love this dress but ended up returning it. It was thinner than expected. The material looked cheap.

The dress was cute & would’ve fit had I actually measured my waist. There is a seam that runs around your waist and it does not give due to the zipper being on the back. Other than that it felt like nice, light weight material, the color was great. Overall I’d recommend it to a friend.
I bought this for my granddaughter to wear to my 50th birthday party and it was perfect! No issues at all.
Purchased for my engagement photos after 3 other dresses from lulus were too small. This a medium, I'd say it was true to size but I'm also a little curvy.

I am 5’2 165lbs I am not skinny. This dress made me feel sexy and comfortable. It has a long back zipper so easy to slip on. The side knot makes your waste look smaller. It’s black, short and sexy. It was perfect for my date night! I didn’t take a pic standing alone but the dress looked great on me. Highly recommend.
Upon opening the package the dress was super wrinkly and then when I opened it all the way up there was a HUGE hole in the dress and it appeared to have already been worn 🤢 . Very disappointing.

Better than expected,  the fabric it's thick and looks great. I love the waist belt cause you can adjust it as you want. I wear XL but I think I could fit on large too. I like the loose look tho. I'm 5.5 and 164lbs for reference

This is the worst quality item I have ever purchased through Amazon. This is not even up to the standards of those other online places that sell dresses for $5 and that tells you a lot.  The fabric is gross and the stitching is so bad that it looks like it was sewn by a blind person WITH THEIR FEET!  Save yourself the trouble of returning it by finding something else. For the $50+ price tag you can get much better somewhere else.
The material felt cheap. Fabric was semi see through. It was comfortable but also fit awkward.

评论概述: Material makes the dress look like a costume
评论详情: Very shiny cheap looking fabric, the cut of the dress is elegant but the purple fabric looks cheap. Not suitable for wearing.
I received so many compliments.  The design is very flattering & runs true to size

I love this dress and got so many compliments but the zipper completely failed. It got stuck about halfway up when I was putting it on and would not budge up or down even with pliers. We ended up just sewing it on the for the evening but that means I was only able to wear it the one time. Such a shame because it is so cute.
This dress fits amazing. I am 5’7” 158lbs and I got a size Medium. Absolutely love it!
This dress was all wrong. The fit is strange. I tried to mess with it to make it work but nothing made it look less…off. Sucks I’m out of the return window.
The teal color is beautiful, but it looked like a super wrinkly satin sheet when I put it on.  Not flattering at all.

this style looks like something different, and different it is. I will probably be donating these dresses because I believe they are a little too floozy for me. I bought a medium and a large and the large fits better.
I got the dress for my bridal shower and absolutely love it! It's so flattering and very comfortable!

评论概述: Must have been a returned item
评论详情: I tried on the dress with the hopes that it would work, since it looks so good in the picture! Unfortunately, not only was the material cheapy, crazy wrinkled, the off shoulder looked off, it also had a very strong smell of cologne/perfume. This led me to believe it was a returned item. How disappointing, hence I returned it.
Beautiful. Looks great. Very sexy

I got a lot of compliments on this dress.  And, it was great for dancing. Dresses often ride up when you’re dancing if they are a bit form fitting. This never did that. My boyfriend loved how soft the material was too.
Was not made of high quality material
Not for petite girls because it was a knee length for me I'm 5’1 and was kind of long on me
Cute and comfortable

Horrible! The material is great not a stiff silk but whomever put the dress together failed to match their pattern pieces at the top. One arm hole was extremely bigger than the other and in the back the left side was smaller than the right which made the zipper and opening pull very noticeably to one side. I had to take in the arm hole and pin the back at the opening a bit to make it look half decent because I was in a pinch!! Never again!
Es un vestido muy lindo y cómodo, me quedo un poco grande del lado donde no lleva manga, le tendré que coger porque solo es en esa parte, el resto me queda bien!. Compré el sise M.

Its hard for me to find dresses because I carry my weight in my midsection so a-lot of dresses aren't flattering on me but this one did me justice! I received nothing but compliments when I wore this dress! I think it would look great on any body style!
I was so happy when this black dress came in and it fit just like the picture!! It’s definitely worth the hype and the quality of fabric is worth it!
The dress is cute and the fit is just ok but the bigger issue is the price, the dress is not worth the amount I paid for it.  Within  days of purchase it Went on sale for 39% less.
True to size awesome little dress
I loved dress, but they didn’t label the color correctly. I ordered Emerald - and this was more on the teal side.
Love this dress, it fit great and it looks very classy
I wore this dress to a wedding and it’s a great dress for the price.  I would definitely buy it again or in another color!

评论概述: Great dress for a great price
评论详情: This dress is flattering and fits well, looks great for a cocktail party (5'1, 130 lbs, size M)
Perfect dress for wedding guest.
Ordered for my anniversary and it looks exactly as pictured,nicer than i expected. Just needed a good steaming. Material is soft and “silk like” 10/10
Cheaply made
Super cute dress. Looks like a boutique find. Zipper could be better quality for the price but wasn’t terrible. Looked great on stage during awards.

This dress was really cute the first time I wore it! I got a ton of compliments. It is true to size and the color was beautiful! Only giving 3 stars because after one wash the material was pilling. If you only plan to wear once, it’s a cute dress for a fun occasion! Just doesn’t hold up for multiple uses or washes, for me that was fine!
Gorgeous! True to size, purchased the color Red. It took a bit to steam the wrinkles out but worth it. Recommend this one!

It was good for what I needed it for. I attended a Kentucky Derby rooftop day party and the dress worked out perfectly!  Not too expensive and not too cheap. The material was nice. I am 5'5 136 lbs and I ordered a medium.  Pretty color!
This dress is so pretty! It seems to made well and the fabric is so nice. I have a mom pooch and this hides it perfectly and so flattering! Highly recommend!

评论概述: Fabric clings to skin/weird neck line
评论详情: This would be much cuter if the fabric wasn’t so clingy to my body. Even Static Guard couldn't make it less clingy to my body. The neck line is also a little weird because it’s not symmetrical. It’s hard to tell that from the photos of the model. The color was beautiful though. For reference, the dress is an XL, I’m 5’4 and 185 lbs.
I'm normally a M, but had to order an S since it runs so big. Material does look cheap.

评论概述: Liked the dress, but came with deodorant and pit stains
评论详情: I was drawn to this dress for my masters graduation. When it came in there was deodorant and sweat stains in the armpits. Disappointed and pretty disgusted….

Looked better in the picture. Wasn't fond of the fabric, felt cheap. The skirt portion was too fitted and showed every 'flaw'. It didn't lay right on my curvy figure. Probably best suited for a 'boyish' figure (straight, no curves). I liked the unique neckline but that didn't work on me, either. So, back it went!
Material and color is impressive but the make is not so good

I'm 5.2 165lbs and I ordered the M. Fit perfectly, looked so cute, length is sexy and at the same time not long or short to jump up and show my privates to people. I usually do not reuse dresses but can't wait to use it again.

I think this is a dress you can wear anywhere. I was taking engagement pics and purchased many dresses including this one. The fabric is silky and the color is rich. Good fit I am a size 4 and the size 4 fit just right.

first, the dress is not the color pictured. it is a brighter pink color. then, when i put on the dress i noticed that you could see each of the front layers bc it was so see through. then i turned around and the back was also completely thin and see through. maybe a darker color would be fine because the dress is comfortable and flattering, but is thin cheaply made material.
I'm 5ft 4 148lbs 34DD -bought a Medium- this dress was perfect. Light ,airly, soft fabric. I bought the green. Fit was perfect.
I’m 5’1” and weight 193 I purchased a 1xl and it fits amazing!!! Perfect dress for a wedding or a date night
Confortable and quality was really high end for the price! Love it!
Dress fits true to size. Very comfortable. I had a little wiggle room. I ordered a 12/14 and that’s my usual size.

评论概述: Loved it!! But definitely more of a copper in person than a brown though!
评论详情: I loved the fit of this dress. It looked and felt super nice! It came super wrinkled out of the package so I’ll probably have to get it dry cleaned. I bought it for an awards dinner but I think I’ll be wearing the light pink instead though. I’m 5’8 160lbs so I was worried it would be too short but I bought a medium and it was a perfect fit!
